1370: Huwardo was born in Uterechse straet in 1370.
Got married to Aleberna at age 26 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Aleberna, Diddekin, at age 27.
1373: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Douwen, at age 29.
1376: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Diewiven, at age 32.
1377: Had a son with Aleberna, Richolfus, at age 33.
1379: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Sara, at age 35.
1384: Lost daughter Douwen when Douwen was 12 years old.
1390: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Salome, at age 46.
